items.content_html: X-zen — Minimal Framework for Scalable Node.js Applications X-zen is a lightweight and modular TypeScript framework inspired by the design philosophy of NestJS, but with a simplified and flexible core. It provides a clean, declarative way to build backend applications using decorators, dependency injection, and modular architecture.
items.title: x-threads/x-zen: X-zen — Minimal Framework for Scalable Node.js Applications  X-zen is a lightweight and modular TypeScript framework inspired by the design philosophy of NestJS, but with a simplified and flexible core.  It provides a clean, declarative way to build backend applications using decorators, dependency injection, and modular architecture.

items.content_html: This To-Do List application is a lightweight, browser-based productivity tool designed to help users manage daily tasks efficiently. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the project demonstrates core web development concepts and CRUD functionality without the use of external libraries or frameworks.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
